short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supply AO & AR & Chivesweave Blockchain. Personal Drive, Upload files free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Create AR and AO wallets, and support the creation of wallets by importing JSON key files.
2. Check token balances, send tokens to others, and generate QR codes for receiving tokens.
3. List all popular tokens and allow users to add their favorite tokens.
4. Create a brand-new token specifically for your project.
5. Obtain your favorite tokens for free every day or through a one-time request at the faucet hub.
6. Support multiple languages and offer both dark and light themes.
7. Manage your contacts within the application.
8. Support Chivesweave Blockchain Network.
9 Support upload files free on Chivesweave.
10 Get coins every day in Faucet page.
